name: Anomalistic Revolution: Prelude
description:
Unsolved mysteries, unanswered questions, myths, and superstitions fade into history.
Three people embark on a journey to uncover ultimate truths in the world of zeros and ones.
Witness their extraordinary adventure as it intersects with corporations, monsters, and distant planets.



"Anomalistic Revolution" is an immersive game that combines RPG, visual novel, and action-runner mechanics.
Enter the world of a software developer who creates an absolute-truth-seeking program.
The price for his success must be paid as he grapples with demons and monsters in his nightmares.



GAME FEATURES

Character Development:

Develop your character's physical and mental abilities throughout the story to help them overcome real and fantastical challenges.

Dialogue Choices:

Shape the story and your character through interactive dialogue options. Enjoy an engaging and intriguing storyline.

Journey into Memories:

Explore your character's past and uncover memories by delving into gray and dark areas. Benefit from remembering buried events.

Software Interface:

Solve the country's greatest mystery using powerful computer software. Uncover truths while navigating corporate intrigues and everyday challenges.

Action-Runner Mechanics:

Face demons and monsters in your nightmares, experiencing fast-paced action scenes and feeling the power of the katana.
